description.displayText: Yaa was hired days before I needed her and exceeded all expectations. She was accommodating to my grandmother's Alzheimer's, sitting with her all day just to keep her company. And she was also dependable for the two days I hired her for. Please hire her if your looking for a reliable caregiver for your loved ones, you won't be disappointed. I will definitely be using her again.
description.originalText: Yaa was hired days before I needed her and exceeded all expectations. She was accommodating to my grandmother's Alzheimer's, sitting with her all day just to keep her company. And she was also dependable for the two days I hired her for. Please hire her if your looking for a reliable caregiver for your loved ones, you won't be disappointed. I will definitely be using her again.

description.displayText: I worked with Yaa for about 3 years and I enjoyed each and every moment. She was the caregiver for my mum. She bath her, dressed her, cooked and clean and even offered to take her on her appointments which I made her outstanding. She is polite and so reliable. I would recommend her to anyone looking to have an amazing experience for themselves or their loved once because she is a tremendous person and God Bless her for the great works she does.
